articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
Hi!
I am a student at the University of Toronto. I’m in the Data Science Specialist Program.
Recently, I gave a workshop on web scraping and APIs. You can look at my past projects in the projects page.
My massive GPA at U of T shows that I am both hardworking and understand the content of my courses. Some notable courses I’ve taken are CSC207(Intro to Software Design), CSC236(Intro to Theory of Computation) and STA257(Probability and Statistics I).
I use many python libraries such as pandas and matplotlib, and am used to writing scripts that help me collect and process data.
My main skills are my knowledge of web infrastructures(as I’ve done many web-scraping projects), my familiarity with many Python libraries, my general knowledge of programming concepts and my ability to present information to a general audience.

            Bio
            I’m Kevin Wang!
            I study data science at the University of Toronto. I draw and code in my spare time.
            My goal is to have fun, and create real-world impact through programming.
            
            
            Experience
            ISSC | Web Scraping and APIs workshop | July 2021
            STEM Fellowship | Google Analytics Team | September 2019 - October 2020
            
            
            Projects
            Edworthy Web Scraping Project
            Uses discord and web scraping to notify me when my favorite locations are empty. Uses BeautifulSoup and discord.py in python.
            
            Course Review System
            Java command line application that allows users to login, view, rate, and comment on courses. Follows SOLID principles and clean architecture, and utilises many design patterns. This was my final project for CSC207 at U of T.
            
            
            Education
            University of Toronto | Toronto, ON GPA 3.93/4.00
            Data Science Specialist | September 2020 - May 2024

articles.title: Projects
articles.description: Selected projects in R and python.
articles.contents:
Contents
League of Legends Web Scraping Project(V2)
Course Review System Project
Edworthy web scraping project
House prices linear regression project

League of Legends Web Scraping Project(V2)
Collected metrics for matches of the popular game, League of Legends. Web scraped the popular site, LeagueOfGraphs.com, and collected data from the official Riot Games API to record over 200 variables for each game for the purpose of data analysis.

github repository
Course Review System Project
Command line tool that allows users to login, view, comment on and rate courses. Built in Java, this application follows SOLID principles and Clean Architecture, and uses software design patterns to implement many features. This was the final project for my Intro to Software Design class at U of T.

github repository
Edworthy web scraping project
A bot that looks at google search results and tells me when parks are empty, so that I can go on walks. Uses BeautifulSoup and discord.py in python.

Google results(left) gets translated to a Bot notification(right)
github repository
House prices linear regression project
Predicting house prices in Ames, Iowa. This was a data science challenge on Kaggle. Used data cleaning and linear regression techniques to score in the top 15 percent of participants.
github repository
